GK19danddk1u:2: mithilām apraviśyaiva bahiḥ kva=cin maṭhi kāyā viśramitum etya kayā api vṛddhatāpasyā dattapādyaḥ kṣaṇam alindabhūmāv avāsthiṣi |
GK19danddk1u:3: tasyās tu maddarśanād eva kim apy ābaddhadhāram aśru prāvartata |
GK19danddk1u:4: ' kim etad amba kathaya kāraṇam ' iti pṛṣṭā sakaruṇam ācaṣṭa - 'jaivātṛka nanu śrūyate
GK19danddk1u:6: tasya khalu magadharājo rājahamsaḥ paraṃ mitram āsīt |
GK19danddk1u:7: tayoś ca vallabhe balaśambalayor iva vasumatīpriyamvade sakhyam apratimam adhattām |
GK19danddk1u:8: atha prathamagarbhābhinanditāṃ tāṃ ca priyasakhīṃ didṛkṣuḥ priyamvadā vasumatīṃ saha bhartrā puṣpapuram agamat |
GK19danddk1u:9: tasminn eva ca samaye mālavena magadharājasya mahaj janyam ajani |
GK19danddk1u:12_0: maithilendras tu mālavendraprayatnaprāṇitaḥ svaviṣayaṃ prati nivṛtto jyeṣṭhasya samhāravarmaṇaḥ
GK19danddk1u:12_1: sutair vikaṭavarmaprabhṛtibhir vyāptaṃ rājyam ākarṇya svasrīyāt suhmapater daṇḍāvayavam
GK19danddk1u:13: tatsutena ca kanīyasā hastavartinā sahaikākinī vanacaraśaravarṣabhayapalāyitā vanam agāhiṣi
GK19danddk1u:14: tatra ca me śārdūlanakhāvalīḍhanipatitāyāḥ pāṇibhraṣṭaḥ sa bālakaḥ kasya api kapilāśavasya kroḍam abhyalīyata |
GK19danddk1u:15: tacchavākarṣiṇaś ca vyāghrasya asūn iṣur iṣvasanayantramuktaḥ kṣaṇād alikṣat |
GK19danddk1u:17_0: sā tv ahaṃ mohasuptā kena api vṛṣṇipālenopanīya svaṃ kuṭīram āveśya kṛpayopakrāntavraṇā
GK19danddk1u:17_1: svasthībhūya svabhartur anti kam upatiṣṭhāsur asahāyatayā yāvad vyākulībhavāmi tāvan
GK19danddk1u:17_2: mamaiva duhitā saha yūnā kena api tam evoddeśam āgamat |
GK19danddk1u:19_0: ruditānte ca sā sārthaghāte svahastagatasya rājaputrasya kirātabhartṛhastagamanam
GK19danddk1u:19_1: ātmanaś ca kena api vanacareṇa vraṇaviropaṇam svasthāyāś ca punas tenopayantuṃ cintitā
GK19danddk1u:19_2: yā nikṛṣṭajātisamsargavaiklavyāt pratyākhyānapāruṣyam tad akṣameṇa ca amunā
GK19danddk1u:20: vivikte vipine svaśiraḥ kartanodyamam anena yūnā yadṛcchayā dṛṣṭena tasya durātmano hananam ātmanaś copayamanam ity akathayat |
GK19danddk1u:21: sa tu pṛṣṭo maithilendrasyaiva ko 'pi sevakaḥ kāraṇavilambī tanmārgānusārī jātaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:22: saha tena bhartur antikam upasṛtya putravṛttā ntena śrotram asya devyāḥ priyamvadāyāś ca adahāva
GK19danddk1u:23: sa ca rājā diṣṭadoṣāj jyeṣṭhaputraiś ciraṃ vigṛhya punar asahiṣṇutayā atimātraṃ ciraṃ prayudhya baddhaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:25: dagdhā punar aham asminn api vārddhake hatajīvitam apārayantī hātuṃ pravrajyāṃ kila agrahīṣam
GK19danddk1u:26: duhitā tu mama hatajīvitākṛṣṭā vikaṭavarmamahādevīṃ kalpasundarīṃ kila aśiśriyat |
GK19danddk1u:27: tau ced rājaputrau nirupadravāv eva avardhiṣyetām iyatā kālena tavemāṃ vayoavasthām asprakṣyetām
GK19danddk1u:28: tayoś ca sator na dāyādā narendrasya prasahyakāriṇo bhaveyuḥ ' iti pramanyur abhiruroda |
GK19danddk1u:29: śrutvā ca tāpasīgiram aham api pravṛddhabāṣpo nigūḍham abhyadhām -- 'yady evam amba samāśvasihi
GK19danddk1u:30: nanv asti kaś cin munis tvayā tadavasthayā putrābhyupapādanārthaṃ yācitas tena sa labdho vardhitaś ca |
GK19danddk1u:34: śakyaś ca mayā asau vikaṭavarmā yathākathaṃcid upaśliṣya vyāpādayitum |
GK19danddk1u:35: anujāḥ punar atibahavaḥ tair api ghaṭante paurajānapadāḥ |
GK19danddk1u:36: māṃ tu na kaś=cid ihatya īdṛktayā jano jānāti |
GK19danddk1u:37: pitarāv api tāvan māṃ na samvidāte kim utetare |
GK19danddk1u:38: tad enam artham upāyena sādhayiṣyāmi ' ity agādiṣam |
GK19danddk1u:39: sā tu vṛddhā saruditaṃ pariṣvajya muhuḥ śirasy upāghrāya prasnutastanī sagadgadam agadat -
GK19danddk1u:43: adyaiva prahāravarmaṇy adhi videhā jātāḥ yataḥ pralambamānapīnabāhur bhavān apāram etac chokasāgaram adyottārayituṃ sthitaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:44: aho mahad bhāgadheyaṃ devyāḥ priyamvadāyāḥ ' iti harṣanirbharā snānabhojanādinā mām upācarat
GK19danddk1u:45: aśiśriyaṃ ca asmin maṭhaikadeśe niśi kaṭaśayyām |
GK19danddk1u:46: acintayaṃ ca - 'vinopadhinā ayam artho na sādhyaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:49: kiñ=cij jālam ācareyam ' iti cintayaty eva mayi mahārṇavonmagnamārtaṇḍaturaṅgamaśvāsarayāvadhūteva vyāvartata triyāmā |
GK19danddk1u:50: samugragarbhavāsajaḍīkṛta iva mandapratāpo divasakaraḥ prādur āsīt |
GK19danddk1u:51: utthāya avasāyitadinamukhaniyamavidhis tāṃ me mātaram avādiṣam -- ' amba jālmasya vikaṭavarmaṇaḥ
GK19danddk1u:52: kac=cid antaḥpuravṛttāntam abhijānāsi ' ity anavasitavacanae eva mayi kā=cid aṅganā pratyadṛśyata
GK19danddk1u:53: tāṃ ca avekṣya sā me dhātrī harṣāśrukuṇṭhitakaṇṭham ācaṣṭa -- 'putri
GK19danddk1u:55: ayam asāv akṛpayā mayā vane parityaktaḥ punar apy evam āgataḥ ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:56: sā tu harṣanirbharanipīḍitā ciraṃ prarudya bahu vilapya śāntā punaḥ svamātrā rājāntaḥpuravṛttāntākhyāne nyayujyata |
GK19danddk1u:57: uktaṃ ca tayā -- 'kumāra kāmarūpeśvarasya kalindavarmanāmnaḥ kanyā kalpasundarī kalāsu rūpe
GK19danddk1u:58: ca apsaraso 'py atikrāntā patim abhibhūya vartate |
GK19danddk1u:63: anurūpabha rtṛgāminīnāṃ ca vāsavadattādīnāṃ varṇanena grāhaya anuśayam |
GK19danddk1u:65: api prayatnena anviṣya prakāśayantī mānam asyā vardhaya ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:66: punar idam ambām avocam -- ' ittham eva tvayā apy
GK19danddk1u:68: pratyahaṃ ca yad yat tatra vṛttaṃ tad asmi tvayaiva bodhyaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:70: prasādhanāya cchāyeva an=apāyinī kalpasundarīm anuvartatām ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:71: te ca tam arthaṃ tathaiva anvatiṣṭhatām |
GK19danddk1u:72: keṣucid dineṣu gateṣv ācaṣṭa māṃ madambā --
GK19danddk1u:73: 'vatsa mādhavīva picumandāśleṣiṇī yathā asau śocyam ātmānaṃ manyeta tathopapādya sthāpitā
GK19danddk1u:75: punar aham abhilikhyātmanaḥ pratikṛtim ' iyam amuṣmai neyā |
GK19danddk1u:76: nītāṃ caināṃ nirvarṇya sā niyatam evaṃ vakṣyati
GK19danddk1u:77: -- ' nanv asti kaś cid īdṛśākāraḥ pumān ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:78: pratibrūhy enām -- ' yadi syāt tataḥ kim ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:79: tasya yad uttaraṃ sā dāsyati tad aham asmi pratibodhanīyaḥ ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:80: sā ' tathā ' iti rājakulam upasaṅkramya pratinivṛttā mām ekānte nyavedayat -- 'vatsa darśito
GK19danddk1u:82: citrīyamāṇā ca asau ' bhuvanam idaṃ sanāthīkṛtaṃ yad deve 'pi kusumadhanvani nedṛśī vapuḥśrīḥ samnidhatte |
GK19danddk1u:84: na ca tam avaimi ya īdṛśam ihatyo nirmimīte |
GK19danddk1u:85: kenedam ālikhitam ' ity ādṛtavatī vyāhṛtavatī ca |
GK19danddk1u:86: mayā ca smerayodīritam -- ' devi sadṛśam ājñāpayasi |
GK19danddk1u:87: bhagavān makaraketur apy evaṃ sundara iti na śakyam eva sambhāvayitum |
GK19danddk1u:89: kvacid īdṛ śam api rūpaṃ daivaśaktyā sambhavet |
GK19danddk1u:90: atha tu yady evaṃrūpo rūpānurūpaśilpaśīlavidyājñānakauśalo yuvā mahākulīnaś ca kaś=cit samnihitaḥ syāt sa kiṃ lapsyate ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:92: śarīraṃ dṛdayaṃ jīvitam iti sarvam idam alpam anarhaṃ ca |
GK19danddk1u:94: na ced ayaṃ vipralambhas tasya amuṣya darśanānubhavena yathedaṃ cakṣuś caritārthaṃ bhavet tathā anugrahaḥ kāryaḥ ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:95: bhūyo 'pi mayā dṛḍhatarīkartum upanyastam - ' asti ko 'pi rājasūnur nigūḍhaṃ caran |
GK19danddk1u:96: amuṣya vasantotsave saha sakhībhir nagaropavanavihāriṇī ratir iva vigrahiṇī yadṛcchayā darśanapathaṃ gatā asi |
GK19danddk1u:97: gataś ca asau kāmaśaraikalakṣya tāṃ mām anvavartiṣṭa |
GK19danddk1u:98: mayā ca vām anyoanyānurūpair durlabhair ākārādibhir guṇātiśayaiś ca preryamāṇayā tadracitair eva kusumaśekharasraganulepanādibhiś ciram upāsitā asi |
GK19danddk1u:99: sādṛśyaṃ ca svam anena svayam eva abhilikhya tvatsamādhigāḍhatvadarśanāya preṣi tam |
GK19danddk1u:100: eṣa ced artho niścitas tasya amuṣya atimānuṣaprāṇasattvaprajñāprakarṣasya na kiñ=cid duṣkaraṃ nāma |
GK19danddk1u:103: tayā tu kiñ=cid iva dhyātvā punar abhihitam - ' amba tava naitad idānīṃ gopyatamam |
GK19danddk1u:105: mama tātasya rājñā prahāravarmaṇā saha mahatī prītir āsīt |
GK19danddk1u:106: mātuś ca me mānavatyāḥ priyavayasyā devī priyamvadāsīt |
GK19danddk1u:107: tābhyāṃ punar ajātāpatyābhyām eva kṛtaḥ samayo abhūt -- ' āvayoḥ putravatyāḥ putrāya duhitṛmatyā duhitā deyā ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:108: tātas tu māṃ jātāṃ pranaṣṭāpatyā priyamvadeti prārthayamānāya vikaṭavarmaṇe daivād dattavān
GK19danddk1u:109: ayaṃ ca niṣṭhuraḥ pitṛdrohī na atyupasannasaṃsthānaḥ kāmopacāreṣv alabdhavaicakṣaṇyaḥ kalāsu
GK19danddk1u:110: mandābhiniveśaḥ śauryonmādī durvikatthano anṛtavādī ca asthānavarṣī |
GK19danddk1u:111: na atirocate me eṣa bhartā viśeṣataś caiṣu vāsareṣu |
GK19danddk1u:112: yad ayam udyāne madantaraṅgabhūtāṃ puṣkarikām apy upāntavartinīm anādṛtya mayi baddhasāpatnyamatsarām anātmajñām ātmanāṭakīyāṃ ramayantikā nāma
GK19danddk1u:113: apatyanir=viśeṣaṃ matsamvardhitāyāś campakalatāyāḥ svayam avacitābhiḥ su=manobhir alam akārṣīt
GK19danddk1u:114: madupabhuktamukte citrakūṭagarbhavedikāgate ratnatalpe tayā saha vyahārṣīt |
GK19danddk1u:115: ayogyaś ca pumān avajñātuṃ ca pravṛttaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:124: anena amuṣya pade pratiṣṭhāpya tam eva atyantam upacarya jīviṣyāmi ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:127: tatas tasyā eva sakāśād antaḥpuraniveśam antarvamśikapuruṣasthānāni pramadavanapradeśān api vibhāgena avagamya
GK19danddk1u:128: astagirikūṭapātakṣubhitaśoṇita iva śoṇībhavati bhānubimbe paścimāmbudhipayaḥpātanirvāpitapataṅgāṅgāradhūmasambhāra iva bharitanabhasi tamasi vijṛmbhite paradāraparāmarśonmukhasya
GK19danddk1u:129_0: mamācāryakam iva kartum utthite guruparigrahaślāghini grahāgresare kṣapākare kalpasundarīvadanapuṇḍarīkeṇeva
GK19danddk1u:131: vyacītaraṃ ca - ' siddhaprāya eva ayam arthaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:133: sā apy arthakāmayor dvayor upalambhe śāstrakārair anumataiveti |
GK19danddk1u:134: gurujanabandhamokṣopāyasandhinā mayā caiṣa vyatikramaḥ kṛtas tad api pāpaṃ nirhṛtya kiyatyā api dharmakalayā māṃ samagrayed iti |
GK19danddk1u:135: api tv etad ākarṇya devo rājavāhanaḥ suhṛdo vā kiṃ nu vakṣyanti ' iti cintāparādhīna eva nidrayā parāmṛśye |
GK19danddk1u:137: āha sma ca - ' saumya upahāravarman mā sma te durvikalpo bhūt |
GK19danddk1u:140: sā ca kadā=cin madviloḍanā=sahiṣṇur mām aśapat -
GK19danddk1u:142: aśapyata mayā ca - ' yatheha bahubhogyā tathā
GK19danddk1u:143: prāpya api mānuṣyakam an=ekasādhāraṇī bhava ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:144: abhyarthitaś ca anayā ' ekapūrvāṃ punas tvām
GK19danddk1u:146: tad ayam artho bhavya eva bhavatā nir=āśaṅkyaḥ ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:147: pratibudhya ca prītiyuktas tadahar api priyāsaṅketavyatikarādismaraṇena aham anaiṣam |
GK19danddk1u:148: anyedyur ananyathāvṛttir anaṅgo mayy eveṣuvarṣam avarṣat |
GK19danddk1u:151: kārdamikanivasanaś ca dṛḍhataraparikaraḥ khaḍgapāṇir upahṛtopaskaraḥ smaran mātṛdattāny abhijñānāni rājamandiraparikhām udambhasam upātiṣṭham |
GK19danddk1u:152: athopa khātaṃ mātṛgṛhadvāre puṣkarikayā prathamasamnidhāpitāṃ veṇuyaṣṭim ādāya tayā śāyitayā ca parikhāṃ sthāpitayā ca prākārabhittim alaṅghayam |
GK19danddk1u:153: adhiruhya pakveṣṭakacitena gopuroparitalādhirohiṇā sopānapathena bhuvam avātaram |
GK19danddk1u:154: avatīrṇaś ca vakulavīthīm atikramya campakāvalivartmanā manāg ivopasṛtyottarāhi karuṇaṃ cakravākamithunaravam aśṛṇavam |
GK19danddk1u:155_0: punar udīcā pāṭalipathena sparśalabhyaviśālasaudhakuḍyodareṇa śarakṣepam iva gatvā
GK19danddk1u:155_1: punaḥ prācā piṇḍībhāṇḍīrakhaṇḍamaṇḍitobhayapārśvena saikatapathena kiñ=cid uttaram
GK19danddk1u:157: tataś ca gahanataram udaroparacitaratnavedikaṃ mādhavīlatāmaṇḍapam īṣadvivṛtasamudgakonmiṣitabhāsā dīpavartyā nyarūpayam |
GK19danddk1u:160: tatra cāsīt svāstīrṇaṃ kusumaśayanam suratopakaraṇavastugarbhāś ca kamalinīpalāśasampuṭāḥ dantamayas tālavṛntaḥ surabhisalilabharitaś ca bhṛṅgārakaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:161: samupaviśya muhūrtaṃ viśrāntaḥ parimalam atiśayavantam āghrāsiṣam |
GK19danddk1u:164: sā ca subhrūr a=suṣīmakāmā śanair upetya tatra
GK19danddk1u:166: vyasṛjac ca mattarājahamsīva kaṇṭharāgavalgugadgadāṃ giram -- ' vyaktam asmi vipralabdhā
GK19danddk1u:168: ayi hṛdaya kim idam a=kāryaṃ kāryavad adhyasya tada=sambhavena kim evam uttāmyasi |
GK19danddk1u:169: bhagavan pañcabāṇakas tava aparādhaḥ kṛto mayā yad evaṃ dahasi na ca bhasmīkaroṣi ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:170: atha aham āvirbhūya vivṛtadīpabhājanaḥ ' bhāmini nanu bahv aparāddhaṃ bhavatyā cittajanmano yad amuṣya jīvitabhūtā ratir ākṛtyā kadarthitā
GK19danddk1u:171_0: dhanuryaṣṭir bhrūlatābhyām bhramaramālāmayī jyā nīlālakadyutibhiḥ astrāṇy apāṅgavīkṣitavṛṣṭibhiḥ
GK19danddk1u:172_0: parabhṛtarutam atimañjulaiḥ pralāpaiḥ puṣpamayī patākā bhujayaṣṭibhyām digvijayārambhapūrṇakumbhamithunam
GK19danddk1u:172_1: urojakumbhayugalena krīḍāsaro nābhimaṇḍalena samnāhyarathaḥ śroṇimaṇḍalena bhavaratnatoraṇasta
GK19danddk1u:173: ataḥ sthānae eva tvāṃ dunoti mīnaketuḥ |
GK19danddk1u:174: māṃ punar an=aparādham adhikam āyāsayatīty eṣa
GK19danddk1u:176: tat prasīda sundari jīvaya māṃ jīvanauṣadhibhir iva apāṅgair an=aṅgabhujaṅgadaṣṭam |
GK19danddk1u:181: aruṇadaśanakararuhārpaṇavyatikarām atyarthapariślathāṅgīm ārtām iva lakṣayitvā mānasīṃ śārīrīṃ ca dhāraṇāṃ śithilayann ātmānam api tayā samānārtham āpādayam |
GK19danddk1u:182: tatkṣaṇavimuktasaṅgatau ratāvasānikaṃ vidhim anubhavantau ciraparicitāv iva atigūḍhaviśrambhau kṣaṇam avātiṣṭhāvahi |
GK19danddk1u:183: punar aham uṣṇam āyataṃ ca niḥśvasya
GK19danddk1u:184: kiñ=ciddīnadṛṣṭiḥ sacakitaprasāritābhyāṃ bhujābhyām enām an=atipīḍaṃ pariṣvajya na ativiśadam acumbiṣam |
GK19danddk1u:185: aśrumukhī tu sā ' yadi prayāsi nātha prayātam eṣa me jīvitaṃ gaṇaya |
GK19danddk1u:189: avādiṣaṃ ca tām -- ' ayi mugdhe kaḥ sacetanaḥ striyam abhikāmayamānāṃ na abhinandati |
GK19danddk1u:190: yadi madanugrahaniścalas tava abhisandhir ācara a=vicāraṃ madupadiṣṭam |
GK19danddk1u:192: ācakṣva ca - ' kim iyam ākṛ tiḥ puruṣasaundaryasya pāram ārūḍhā na vā ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:193: ' bāḍham ārūḍhā ' iti nūnam asau vakṣyati |
GK19danddk1u:194: brūhi bhūyaḥ -- ' yady evam asti kā api tāpasī
GK19danddk1u:197: so 'sti tādṛśo mantro yena tvam upoṣitā parvaṇi

GK19danddk1u:372: so 'pi tajjñaḥ ' kim ajñair ebhir vyutpāditaiḥ |

GK19danddk1u:377: so 'pi viṭabrāhmaṇaḥ svavāṭakukkuṭavijayahṛṣṭo mayi vayoviruddhaṃ sakhyam upetya tadahaḥ svagṛhae eva snānabhojanādi kārayitvottaredyuḥ śrāvastīṃ prati yāntaṃ mām
GK19danddk1u:378: anugamya ' smartavyo 'si saty arthe iti mitravad visṛjya pratyayāsīt |
GK19danddk1u:379: ahaṃ ca gatvā śrāvastīm adhvaśrānto bāhyodyāne latāmaṇḍape śayito 'smi |
GK19danddk1u:380: hamsakaravaprabodhitaś cotthāya kām api kvaṇitanūpuramukharābhyāṃ caraṇābhyāṃ madantikam upasarantīṃ yuvatīm adrākṣam |
GK19danddk1u:381: sā tv āgatya svahastavartini citrapaṭe likhitaṃ matsadṛśaṃ kim api puṃrūpaṃ māṃ ca paryāyeṇa nirvarṇayantī savismayaṃ savitarkaṃ saharṣaṃ ca kṣaṇam avātiṣṭhata |
GK19danddk1u:382: mayā api tatra citrapaṭe matsādṛśyaṃ paśyatā taddṛṣṭiceṣṭitam anākasmikaṃ manyamānena ' nanu sarvasādhāraṇo 'yaṃ ramaṇīyaḥ puṇyārāmabhūmibhāgaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:389: yadi na doṣo madgṛhe 'dya viśramitum anugrahaḥ kriyatām ' ity aśamsat |
GK19danddk1u:390_0: ahaṃ ca ' ayi mugdhe naiṣa doṣo guṇa eva ' iti tadanumārgagāmī tadgṛhagato rājārheṇa
GK19danddk1u:390_1: snānabhojanādinopacaritaḥ sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇo rahasi paryapṛcchye -- ' mahābhāga digantarāṇi
GK19danddk1u:390_2: bhramatā kaccid asti kiñcid adbhutaṃ bhavatopalabdham ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:391: mama abhavan manasi -- ' mahad idam āśāspadam |
GK19danddk1u:392_0: eṣā khalu nikhilaparijanasambādhasamlakṣitāyāḥ sakhī rājadārikāyāḥ citrapaṭe ca asminn
GK19danddk1u:392_1: api tadupariviracitasitavitānaṃ harmyatalam tadgataṃ ca prakāmavistīrṇaṃ śaradabhrapaṭalapāṇḍuraṃ
GK19danddk1u:392_2: śayanam tadadhiśāyinī ca nidrālīḍhalocanā mamaiveyaṃ pratikṛtiḥ |
GK19danddk1u:393_0: ato nūnam anaṅgena sā api rājakanyā tāvatīṃ bhūmim āropitā yasyām asahyamadanajvaravyathitonmāditā
GK19danddk1u:393_2: dattavatī rūpasamvādāc ca samśayānayā anayā pṛṣṭo bhindyām asyāḥ samśayaṃ yathānubhavakathanena
GK19danddk1u:394: iti jātaniścayo 'bravam -- ' bhadre dehi citrapaṭam ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:397_0: punas tam ādāya tām api vyājasuptām ullasanmadanarāgavihvalāṃ vallabhām ekatraiva
GK19danddk1u:397_1: abhilikhya ' kācid evaṃbhūtā yuvatir īdṛśasya pumsaḥ pārśvaśāyiny- araṇyānīprasuptena
GK19danddk1u:399: hṛṣṭayā tu tayā vistarataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sarvam eva vṛttāntam akathayam |
GK19danddk1u:400: asau ca sakhyā mannimittāny avasthāntarāṇy avarṇayat |
GK19danddk1u:401: tad ākarṇya ca ' yadi tava sakhyā
GK19danddk1u:403: kam api kanyāpure nirāśaṅkanivāsakaraṇam upāyam āracayyāgamiṣyāmi ' iti kathañcid enām
GK19danddk1u:404: abhyupagamayya gatvā tad eva kharvaṭaṃ vṛddhaviṭena samagaṃsi |
GK19danddk1u:406: snānabhojanādi kārayitvā rahasy apṛcchat -- ' ārya kasya hetor acireṇaiva pratyāgato 'si |
GK19danddk1u:407: pratyavādiṣam enam - ' sthānae eva aham āryeṇa asmi pṛṣṭaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:410: tasyāḥ patir apara iva dharmaputro dharmavardhano nāma rājā |
GK19danddk1u:411: tasya duhitā pratyādeśa iva śriyaḥ prāṇā iva kusumadhanvanaḥ saukumāryaviḍambitanavamālikā vanamālikā nāma kanyā |
GK19danddk1u:412: sā mayā samāpattidṛṣṭā kāmanārācapaṅktim iva kaṭākṣamālāṃ mama marmaṇi vyakirat |
GK19danddk1u:413: tacchalyoddharaṇakṣamaś ca dhanvantarisadṛśas tvad ṛte netaro 'sti vaidya iti pratyāgato 'smi
GK19danddk1u:415: ayam ahaṃ parivartitastrīveṣas te kanyā nāma bhaveyam |
GK19danddk1u:416: anugataś ca mayā tvam upagamya dharmāsanagataṃ dharmavardhanaṃ vakṣyasi -- ' mameyam ekaiva duhitā |
GK19danddk1u:417: jātamātrāyāṃ tv asyāṃ janany asyāḥ saṃsthitā |
GK19danddk1u:418: mātā ca pitā ca bhūtvā aham eva vyavardhayam |
GK19danddk1u:419: etadartham eva vidyāmayaṃ śulkam arjituṃ gato abhūd avantinagarīm ujjayinīm asmadvaivāhyakulajaḥ ko 'pi vipradārakaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:420: tasmai ceyam anumatā dātum itarasmai na yogyā |
GK19danddk1u:423: tena tam ānīya pāṇim asyā grāhayitvā tasmin nyastabhāraḥ samnyasiṣye |
GK19danddk1u:424: durabhirakṣatayā tu duhit-rṇāṃ muktaśaiśavānāṃ viśeṣataś ca amātṛkāṇām iha devaṃ
GK19danddk1u:426_0: yadi vṛddhaṃ brāhmaṇam adhītinam agatim atithiṃ ca mām anugrāhyapakṣe gaṇayaty ādirājacaritadhuryo
GK19danddk1u:426_1: devaḥ saiṣā bhavadbhujacchāyām akhaṇḍitacāritrā tāvad adhyāstāṃ yāvad asyāḥ pāṇigrāhakam
GK19danddk1u:427: sa evam ukto niyatam abhimanāyamānaḥ svaduhitṛsamnidhau māṃ vāsayiṣyati |
GK19danddk1u:428_0: gatas tu bhavān āgāmini māsi phālgune phalgunīṣūttarāsu bhāvini rājāntaḥpurajanasya
GK19danddk1u:428_1: tīrthayātrotsave tīrthasnānāt prācyāṃ diśi gorutāntaram atikramya vānīravalayamadhyavartini
GK19danddk1u:429_0: sa khalv aham anabhiśaṅka evaitāvantaṃ kālaṃ saha abhivihṛtya rājakanyayā bhūyas
GK19danddk1u:429_1: tasminn utsave gaṅgāmbhasi viharan vihāravyākule kanyakāsamāje magnopasṛtas tvadabhyāsae
GK19danddk1u:430: punas tvadupahṛte vāsasī paridhāya apanītadārikāveṣo jāmātā nāma bhūtvā tvām eva anugaccheyam
GK19danddk1u:432: anāsādayantī ' tayā vinā na bhokṣye ' iti rudaty eva avarodhane sthāsyati |
GK19danddk1u:433_0: tanmūle ca mahati kolāhale krandatsu parijaneṣu rudatsu sakhījaneṣu śocatsu paurajaneṣu
GK19danddk1u:433_1: kiṅkartavyatāmūḍhe sāmātye pārthive tvam āsthānīm etya māṃ sthāpayitvā vakṣyasi -
GK19danddk1u:433_2: ' deva sa eṣa me jāmātā tava arhati śrībhujārādhanam |
GK19danddk1u:434_0: adhītī caturṣv āmnāyeṣu gṛhītī ṣaṭsv aṅgeṣu ānvīkṣikīvicakṣaṇaḥ catuḥṣaṣṭikalāgamaprayogacaturaḥ
GK19danddk1u:434_1: viśeṣeṇa gajarathaturaṅgatantravit iṣvasanāstrakarmaṇi gadāyuddhe ca nirupamaḥ purāṇetihāsakuśalaḥ
GK19danddk1u:434_2: kartā kāvyanāṭakākhyāyikānām vettā sopaniṣado 'rthaśāstrasya nirmatsaro guṇeṣu viśrambhī
GK19danddk1u:434_3: suhṛtsu śakyaḥ samvibhāgaśīlaḥ śrutadharo gatasmayaś ca |
GK19danddk1u:435: na asya doṣam aṇīyāṃsam apy upalabhe |
GK19danddk1u:437: tan mādṛśasya brāhmaṇamātrasya na labhya eṣa sambandhī |
GK19danddk1u:438: duhitaram asmai samarpya vārddhakocitam antyam āśramaṃ saṅkrameyam yadi devaḥ sādhu manyate ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:439: sa idam ākarṇya vaivarṇyākrāntavaktraḥ param upeto vailakṣyam ārapsyate 'nunetum
GK19danddk1u:441: tvaṃ tu teṣām adattaśrotro muktakaṇṭhaṃ ruditvā cirasya bāṣpakuṇṭhakaṇṭhaḥ kāṣṭhāny āhṛtya agniṃ sandhukṣya rājamandiradvāre citādhirohaṇāyopakramiṣyase |
GK19danddk1u:442: sa tāvad eva tvatpādayor nipatya sāmātyo narapatir anūnair arthais tvām upacchandya duhitaraṃ mahyaṃ datvā madyogyatāsamārādhitaḥ samastam eva rājyabhāraṃ mayi samarpayiṣyati |
GK19danddk1u:443: so 'yam abhyupāyo 'nuṣṭheyaḥ yadi tubhyaṃ rocate ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:445: so 'pi paṭuviṭānām agraṇīr asakṛdabhyastakapaṭaprapañcaḥ pāñcālaśarmā yathoktam abhyadhikaṃ ca nipuṇam upakrāntavān |
GK19danddk1u:447: anvabhavaṃ ca madhukara iva navamālikām ārdrasumanasam |
GK19danddk1u:448: asya rājñaḥ simhavarmaṇaḥ sāhāyyadānaṃ suhṛtsaṅketabhūmigamanam ity ubhayam apekṣya sarvabalasandohena campām imām upagato daivād devadarśanasukham anubhavāmi ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:449: śrutvaitatpramaticaritaṃ smitamukulitamukhanalinaḥ ' vilāsaprāyam ūrjitam mṛduprāyaṃ ceṣṭitam iṣṭa eṣa mārgaḥ prajñāvatām |
GK19danddk1u:450: athedānīm atra bhavān praviśatu iti mitraguptam aikṣata kṣitīśaputraḥ |
GK19danddk1u:451: / iti śrī daṇḍinaḥ kṛtau daśakumāracarite pramaticaritaṃ nāma pañcama ucchvāsaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:453: so 'py ācacakṣe -- ' deva so 'ham api suhṛtsādhāraṇabhramaṇakāraṇaḥ suhmeṣu
GK19danddk1u:454: dāmaliptāhvayasya nagarasya bāhyodyāne mahāntam utsavasamājam ālokayam |
GK19danddk1u:457: aprā kṣaṃ ca -- ' bhadra ko nāma ayam utsavaḥ kim
GK19danddk1u:458: arthaṃ vā samārabdhaḥ kena vā nimittenotsavam anādṛtyaikānte bhavān utkaṇṭhita iva parivādinīdvitīyas tiṣṭhati ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:460: nāma anapatyaḥ prārthitavān amuṣminn āyatane vismṛtavindhyavāsarāgaṃ vasantyā vindhyavāsinyāḥ pādamūlād apatyadvayam |
GK19danddk1u:461: anayā ca kila asmai pratiśayitāya svapne samādiṣṭam
GK19danddk1u:462: -- ' samutpatsyate tavaikaḥ putraḥ janiṣyate caikā duhitā |
GK19danddk1u:464: sā tu saptamād varṣād ārabhyāpariṇayanāt pratimāsaṃ kṛttikāsu kandukanṛtyena guṇavadbhartṛlābhāya māṃ samārādhayatu |
GK19danddk1u:465: yaṃ ca abhilaṣet sā amuṣmai deyā |
GK19danddk1u:467: tato 'lpīyasā kālena rājñaḥ priyamahiṣī medinī nāmaikaṃ putram asūta |
GK19danddk1u:469: sā adya kanyā kandukāvatī nāma somāpīḍāṃ devīṃ kandukavihāreṇārādhayitum āgamiṣyati |
GK19danddk1u:470: tasyās tu sakhī candrasenā nāma dhātreyikā mama priyāsīt |
GK19danddk1u:471: sā caiṣu divaseṣu rājaputreṇa bhīmadhanvanā balavad anuruddhā |
GK19danddk1u:472: tad aham utkaṇṭhito manmathaśaraśalyaduḥkhodvignacetāḥ kalena vīṇāraveṇātmānaṃ kiñ=cid āśvāsayan viviktam adhyāse iti |
GK19danddk1u:473: asminn eva kṣaṇe kim api nūpurakvaṇitam upātiṣṭhat |
GK19danddk1u:475: dṛṣṭvaiva sa enām utphulladṛṣṭir utthāyopagūhya gāḍham upagūḍhakaṇṭhaś ca tayā tatraivopāviśat
GK19danddk1u:476: aśamsac ca -- ' saiṣā me prāṇasamā yadviraho dahana iva dahati mām |
GK19danddk1u:477: idaṃ ca me jīvitam apaharatā rājaputreṇa mṛtyuneva niruṣmatāṃ nītaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:478: na ca śakṣyāmi rājasūnur ity amuṣmin pāpam ācaritum |
GK19danddk1u:479: ato 'nayātmānaṃ sudṛṣṭaṃ kārayitvā tyakṣyāmi niṣpratikriyān prāṇān ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:480: sā tu paryaśrumukhī samabhyadhāt -- ' mā sma nātha
GK19danddk1u:482_0: yas tvam uttamāt sārthavāhād arthadāsād utpadya kośadāsa iti gurubhir abhihitanāmadheyaḥ
GK19danddk1u:482_1: punar madatyāsaṅgād veśadāsa iti dviṣadbhiḥ prakhyāpito 'si tasmims tvayy uparate
GK19danddk1u:482_2: yady ahaṃ jīveyaṃ nṛśamso veśa iti samarthayeyaṃ lokavādam |
GK19danddk1u:483: ato 'dyaiva naya mām īpsitaṃ deśam ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:484: sa tu mām abhyadhatta -- ' bhadra bhavaddṛṣṭeṣu rāṣṭreṣu katamat samṛddhaṃ sampannasasyaṃ satpuruṣabhūyiṣṭhaṃ ca ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:485: tam aham īṣadvihasya abravam -- ' bhadra vistīrṇeyam arṇavāmbarā |
GK19danddk1u:487: api tu na ced iha yuvayoḥ sukhanivāsakāraṇaṃ
GK19danddk1u:488: kam=apy upāyam utpādayituṃ śaknuyāṃ tato 'ham eva bhaveyam adhvadarśī iti |
GK19danddk1u:490: atha asau jātasambhramā ' prāptaiveyaṃ bhartṛdārikā kandukāvatī kandukakrīḍitena devīṃ vindhyavāsinīm ārādhayitum |
GK19danddk1u:494: aham asyāḥ sakāśavartinī bhaveyam ' ity ayāsīt |
GK19danddk1u:496: mahati ratnaraṅgapīṭhe sthitāṃ prathamaṃ tāmrauṣṭhīm apaśyam |
GK19danddk1u:497: atiṣṭhac ca sā sadya eva mama hṛdaye |
GK19danddk1u:498: na mayā anyena vā antarāle dṛṣṭā |
GK19danddk1u:499: citrīyāviṣṭacit taś ca acintayam -- ' kim iyaṃ lakṣmīḥ |
GK19danddk1u:501: tasyāḥ kila haste vinyastaṃ kamalam asyās tu hasta eva kamalam |
GK19danddk1u:502: bhuktapūrvā tu sā purātanena pumsā pūrvarājaiś ca asyāḥ punar anavadyam ayātayāmaṃ ca yauvanam ' iti cintayaty eva mayi sā anaghasarvagātrī
GK19danddk1u:503: vyatyastahastapallavāgraspṛṣṭabhūmir ālolanīlakuṭilālakā savibhramaṃ bhagavatīm abhivandya kandukam amandarāgarūṣitākṣam anaṅgam ivālambata |
GK19danddk1u:506: prasṛtakomalāṅgulinā pāṇipallavena samāhatya hastapṛṣṭhena connīya caṭuladṛṣṭilāñchitaṃ stabakam iva bhramaramālānuviddham avapatantam ākāśae eva agrahīt |
GK19danddk1u:508: madhyavilambitalaye drutalaye mṛdumṛdu ca praharantī tatkṣaṇaṃ cūrṇapadam adarśayat |
GK19danddk1u:511: pakṣam ṛjvāgataṃ ca vāmadakṣiṇābhyāṃ karābhyāṃ paryāyeṇa abhighnatī śakuntam ivodasthāpayat
GK19danddk1u:512: dūrotthitaṃ ca prapatantam āhatya gītamārgam āracayat |
GK19danddk1u:514: evam anekakaraṇamadhuraṃ viharantī raṅgagatasya raktacetaso janasya pratikṣaṇam uccāvacāḥ praśamsāvācaḥ pratigṛhṇatī tatkṣaṇārūḍhaviśrambhaṃ kośadāsam amse
GK19danddk1u:515_0: avalambya kaṇṭakitagaṇḍam utphullekṣaṇaṃ ca mayy abhimukhībhūya tiṣṭhati tatprathamāvatīrṇakandarpakāritakaṭākṣadṛṣṭis
GK19danddk1u:515_2: līlāpallavair iva mukhakamalaparimalagrahaṇalolān ālinas tāḍayantī maṇḍalabhramaṇeṣu
GK19danddk1u:515_3: kandukasya atiśīghrapracāritayā viśantīva maddarśanalajjayā puṣpamayaṃ pañjaram pañcabinduprasṛteṣu
GK19danddk1u:515_4: pañca api pañcabāṇabāṇān yugapad iva abhipatatas trāsena avaghaṭṭayantī gomūtrikāpracāreṣu
GK19danddk1u:516_6: ca niṣadyotthāya nimīlyonmīlya sthitvā gatvā caiva aticitraṃ paryakrīḍata rājakanyā |
GK19danddk1u:517: abhihatya bhūtalākāśayor api krīḍāntarāṇi darśanīyāny ekenaiva anekeneva kandukena adarśayat
GK19danddk1u:518_0: candrasenādibhiś ca priyasakhībhiḥ saha vihṛtya vihṛtānte ca abhivandya devīṃ manasā
GK19danddk1u:518_1: me sānurāgeṇeva parijanena ca anugamyamānā kuvalayaśaram iva kusumaśarasya mayy apāṅgaṃ
GK19danddk1u:518_2: samarpayantī sāpadeśam asakṛdāvartyamānavadanacandramaṇḍalatayā svahṛdayam iva matsamīpe
GK19danddk1u:518_3: preritaṃ pratinivṛttaṃ na vety ālokayantī saha sakhībhiḥ kumārīpuram agamat |
GK19danddk1u:519: ahaṃ ca anaṅgavihvalaḥ svaveśma gatvā kośadāsena yatnavad atyudāraṃ snānabhojanādikam anubhāvito 'smi |
GK19danddk1u:520: sāyaṃ copasṛtya candrasenā rahasi māṃ praṇipatya patyur amsam amsena praṇayapeśalam āghaṭṭayanty upādiśat |
GK19danddk1u:521: ācaṣṭa ca hṛṣṭaḥ kośadāsaḥ -- ' bhūyāsam evam yāvadāyur āyatākṣi tvatprasādasya pātram iti |
GK19danddk1u:522: mayā tu sasmitam abhihitam -- ' sakhe kim etad āśāsyam |
GK19danddk1u:524: anayā tadaktanetrayā rājasūnur upasthito vānarīm ivaināṃ drakṣyati viraktaś caināṃ punas tyakṣyati ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:525: tayā tu smerayā asmi kathitaḥ -- ' so 'yam
GK19danddk1u:526: āryeṇājñākaro jano 'tyartham anugṛhītaḥ yad asminn eva janmani mānuṣaṃ vapur apanīya
GK19danddk1u:530: adya khalu kandukotsave bhavantam avahasitamanobhavākāram abhilaṣantī roṣād iva śambaradviṣā atimātram āyāsyate rājaputrī |
GK19danddk1u:531: so 'yam artho viditabhāvayā mayā svamātre tayā ca
GK19danddk1u:533: viditārthas tu pārthivas tvayā duhituḥ pāṇiṃ grāhayiṣyati |
GK19danddk1u:536: tvadāyatte ca rājye na alam eva tvām atikramya mām avaroddhum bhīmadhanvā |
GK19danddk1u:538: ' iti mām āmantrya priyaṃ copagūhya pratyayāsīt |
GK19danddk1u:539: mama kośadāsasya ca taduktānusāreṇa bahu vikalpayatoḥ kathañ=cid akṣīyata kṣapā |
GK19danddk1u:540: kṣapānte ca kṛtayathocitaniyamas tam eva priyādarśanasubhagam udyānoddeśam upagato 'smi |
GK19danddk1u:541: tatraiva copasṛtya rājaputro nirabhimānam anukūlābhiḥ kathābhir mām anuvartamāno muhūrtam āsta |
GK19danddk1u:543: talpagataṃ ca svapnena anubhūyamānapriyādarśanāliṅganasukham āyasena nigaḍena atibalavadbahupuruṣaiḥ pīvarabhujadaṇḍoparuddham abandhayan mām |
GK19danddk1u:544: pratibuddhaṃ ca sahasā samabhyadhāt -- ' ayi durmate śrutam ālapitaṃ hatāyāś candrasenāyā jālarandhraniḥsṛtaṃ tadekāvabodhaprayuktayā
GK19danddk1u:546_0: tvaṃ kila abhilaṣito varākyā kandukavatyā tava kila anujīvinā mayā stheyam tvadvacaḥ
GK19danddk1u:546_1: kila anatikramatā mayā candrasenā kośadāsāya dāsyate ity uktvā pārśvacaraṃ puruṣam
GK19danddk1u:546_2: ekam ālokya akathayat -- ' prakṣipainaṃ sāgare ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:547: sa tu labdharājya iva atihṛṣṭaḥ ' deva yad ājñāpayasi ' iti yathādiṣṭam akarot |
GK19danddk1u:548: ahaṃ tu nirālambano bhujābhyām itastataḥ spandamānaḥ kim=api kāṣṭhaṃ daivadattam urasopaśliṣya tāvad aploṣi yāvad apāsarad vāsaraḥ śarvarī ca sarvā |
GK19danddk1u:551: te mām uddhṛtya rāmeṣunāmne nāvikanāyakāya kathitavantaḥ -- ' ko 'py ayam āyasanigaḍabaddha eva jale labdhaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:552: so 'yam api siñcet sahasraṃ drākṣāṇāṃ kṣaṇenaikena iti |
GK19danddk1u:556: tāvad atijavā naukāḥ śvāna iva varāham asmatpotaṃ paryarutsata |
GK19danddk1u:559: tān aham agatīn avasīdataḥ samāśvāsya alapiṣam --
GK19danddk1u:561: ayam aham avasādayāmi vaḥ sapatnān ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:563: sarvāmś ca tān pratibhaṭān bhallavarṣiṇā bhīmaṭaṅkṛtena śārṅgeṇa lavalavīkṛtāṅgān akārṣam
GK19danddk1u:564: avaplutya hatavidhvastayodham asmatpotasamsaktapotam amutra nāvikanāyakam anabhisaram abhipatya jīvagrāham agrahīṣam |
GK19danddk1u:566: taṃ ca aham avabudhya jātavrīḍam abravam -- ' tāta kiṃ dṛṣṭāni kṛtāntavilasitāni ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:567: te tu sāmyātrikā madīyenaiva śṛṅkhalena tam atigāḍhaṃ baddhvā harṣakilakilāravam akurvan māṃ ca apy apūjayan |
GK19danddk1u:568: durvārā tu sā naur ananukālavātanunnā dūram abhipatya kam api dvīpaṃ nibiḍam āśliṣṭavatī |
GK19danddk1u:569: tatra ca svādu pānīyam edhāmsi kandamūlaphalāni ca sañjighṛkṣavo gāḍhapātitaśilāvalayam avātarāma
GK19danddk1u:572: parvatanitambabhāgaḥ kāntatareyaṃ gandhapāṣāṇavaty upatyakā śiśiram idam indīvarāravindamakarandabinducandrakottaraṃ gotravāri ramyo 'yam
GK19danddk1u:573_0: anekavarṇakusumamañjarīmañjulataras taruvanābhogaḥ ity atṛptatarayā dṛśā bahu bahu
GK19danddk1u:574: tatra snātaś ca kāmś=cid amṛtasvādūn bisabhaṅgān āsvādya amsalagnakalhāras tāravartinā kena api bhīmarūpeṇa brahmarākṣasena
GK19danddk1u:575: abhipatya ' ko 'si kutastyo 'si ' iti nirbhartsayatā abhyadhīye |
GK19danddk1u:576: nirbhayena ca mayā so 'bhyadhīyata -- ' saumya so aham asmi dvijanmā |
GK19danddk1u:577: śatruhastād arṇavam arṇavād yavananāvam yavananāvaś citragrāvāṇam enaṃ parvatapravaraṃ gato yadṛcchayā asmin sarasi viśrāntaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:579: so 'brūta -- ' na ced bravīṣi praśnān aśnāmi tvām
GK19danddk1u:583: kiṃ krūraṃ strīhṛdayaṃ kiṃ gṛhiṇaḥ priyahitāya dāraguṇāḥ |
GK19danddk1u:584: kaḥ kāmaḥ saṅkalpaḥ kiṃ duṣkarasādhanaṃ prajñā ||
GK19danddk1u:590: tatrāsan gṛhiṇas trayaḥ sphītasāradhanāḥ sodaryā dhanakadhānyakadhanyakākhyāḥ |
GK19danddk1u:591: teṣu jīvatsu na vavarṣa varṣāṇi dvādaśa daśaśatākṣaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:592_0: kṣīṇasāraṃ sasyam oṣadhyo vandhyāḥ na phalavanto vanaspatayaḥ klībā meghāḥ kṣīṇasrotasaḥ
GK19danddk1u:592_1: sravantyaḥ paṅkaśeṣāṇi palvalāni nirnisyandāny utsamaṇḍalāni viralībhūtaṃ kandamūlaphalam
GK19danddk1u:592_2: avahīnāḥ kathāḥ galitāḥ kalyāṇotsavakriyāḥ bahulībhūtāni taskarakulāni anyoanyam
GK19danddk1u:592_3: abhakṣayan prajāḥ paryaluṭhann itastato balākāpāṇḍurāṇi naraśiraḥkapālāni paryahiṇḍanta
GK19danddk1u:593: tae ete gṛhapatayaḥ sarvadhānyanicayam upayujya ajāvikaṃ gavalagaṇaṃ gavāṃ yūthaṃ dāsīdāsajanam apatyāni jyeṣṭhamadhyamabhārye ca krameṇa bhakṣayitvā ' kaniṣṭhabhāryā dhūminī śvo
GK19danddk1u:595: ayaṃ kaniṣṭho dhanyakaḥ priyāṃ svām attum akṣamas tayā saha tasyām eva niśy apāsarat |
GK19danddk1u:597: svamāmsāsṛgapa nītakṣutpipāsāṃ tāṃ nayann antare kam api nikṛttapāṇipādakarṇanāsikam avanipṛṣṭhe viceṣṭamānaṃ puruṣam adrākṣīt |
GK19danddk1u:598: tam apy ārdrāśayaḥ skandhenodvahan kandamūlamṛgabahule gahanoddeśe yatnaracitaparṇaśālaś ciram avasat |
GK19danddk1u:599: amuṃ ca ropitavraṇam iṅgudītailādibhir āmiṣeṇa śākenātmanirviśeṣaṃ pupoṣa |
GK19danddk1u:600: puṣṭaṃ ca tam udriktadhātum ekadā mṛgānveṣaṇāya ca prayāte dhanyake sā dhūminī riramsayopātiṣṭhat
GK19danddk1u:602: nivṛttaṃ ca patim udakābhyarthinam ' uddhṛtya kūpāt piba rujati me śiraḥ śirorogaḥ ' ity udañcanaṃ sarajjuṃ puraś cikṣepa |
GK19danddk1u:603: udañcantaṃ ca taṃ kūpād apaḥ kṣaṇāt pṛṣṭhato gatvā praṇunoda |
GK19danddk1u:604: taṃ ca vikalaṃ skandhenoduhya deśād deśāntaraṃ paribhramantī pativratāpratītiṃ lebhe bahuvidhāś ca pūjāḥ |
GK19danddk1u:606: atha pānīyārthisārthajanasamāpattidṛṣṭoddhṛtam avantiṣu bhramantam āhārārthinaṃ bhartāram upalabhya sā dhūminī ' yena me patir vikalīkṛtaḥ sa durātmā
GK19danddk1u:607: ayam ' iti tasya sādhoś citravadham ajñena rājñā
GK19danddk1u:609: dhanyakas tu dattapaścādbandhaḥ vadhyabhūmiṃ nīyamānaḥ saśeṣatvād āyuṣaḥ ' yo mayā vikalī
GK19danddk1u:610: kṛto 'bhimato bhikṣuḥ sa cen me pāpam ācakṣīta
GK19danddk1u:611: yukto me daṇḍaḥ ' ity adīnam adhikṛtaṃ jagāda |
GK19danddk1u:612: ' ko doṣaḥ ' ity upanīya darśite 'muṣmin sa vikalaḥ paryaśruḥ pādapatitas tasya sādhos
GK19danddk1u:613: tatsukṛtam asatyāś ca tasyās tathābhūtaṃ duścaritam āryabuddhir ācacakṣe |
GK19danddk1u:614: kupitena rājñā virūpitamukhī sā duṣkṛtakāriṇī kṛtā śvabhyaḥ pācikā |
GK19danddk1u:616: tad bravīmi -- ' strī hṛdayaṃ krūram ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:617: punar anuyukto gominīvṛttāntam ākhyātavān - ' asti draviḍeṣu kāñcī nāma nagarī |
GK19danddk1u:619: so 'ṣṭādaśavarṣadeśī yaś cintām āpede -- ' na asty adārāṇām ananuguṇadārāṇāṃ vā sukhaṃ
GK19danddk1u:621: tat kathaṃ nu guṇavad vindeyaṃ kalatram ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:622: atha parapratyayāhṛteṣu dāreṣu yādṛcchikīṃ sampattim anabhisamīkṣya kārtāntiko nāma bhūtvā vastrāntapinaddhaśāliprastho bhuvaṃ babhrāma |
GK19danddk1u:626: dṛṣṭvā sa kila sma bravīti -- ' bhadre śaknoṣi kim
GK19danddk1u:627: anena śāliprasthena guṇavad annam asmān abhyavahārayitum ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:628: sa hasitāvadhūto gṛhād gṛhaṃ praviśya abhramat |
GK19danddk1u:629: ekadā tu śibiṣu kāverītīrapattane saha pitṛbhyām avasitamaharddhim avaśīrṇabhavanasārāṃ dhātryā pradarśyamānāṃ kāñ=cana
GK19danddk1u:631: asyāṃ samsaktacakṣuś ca atarkayat -- ' asyāḥ khalu kanyakāyāḥ sarvae eva avayavā na atisthūlā na atikṛśā na atihrasvā na atidīrghā na vikaṭā mṛjāvantaś ca |
GK19danddk1u:632_1: māmsalāv aśirālau ca aṅghrī jaṅghe ca anu pūrvavṛtte pīvarorugraste iva durupalakṣye
GK19danddk1u:632_2: jānunī sakṛdvibhaktaś caturasraḥ kakundaravibhāgaśobhī rathāṅgākārasamsthitaś ca
GK19danddk1u:632_3: nitambabhāgaḥ tanutaram īṣannimnaṃ gambhīraṃ nābhimaṇḍalaṃ valitrayeṇa ca alaṃkṛtam
GK19danddk1u:634: paryante 'py akapilarucir āyāmavān ekaikanisargasamasnigdhanīlo gandhagrāhī ca
GK19danddk1u:637: āsajjati ca me hṛdayam asyām eva |
GK19danddk1u:639: avimṛśyakāriṇā hi niyatam anekāḥ patanty anuśayaparamparāḥ ' iti snigdhadṛṣṭir ācaṣṭa --
GK19danddk1u:640: ' bhadre kac=cid asti kauśalaṃ śāliprasthena anena sampannam āhāram asmān abhyavahārayitum ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:642: tasya hastāt prasthamātraṃ dhānyam ādāya kva=cid
GK19danddk1u:644: sā kanyā tān gandhaśālīn saṅkṣudya mātrayā viśoṣyātape muhur muhuḥ parivartya sthirasamāyāṃ bhūmau nālīpṛṣṭhena mṛdumṛdu ghaṭṭayantī tuṣair akhaṇḍais taṇḍulān pṛthak cakāra |
GK19danddk1u:645: jagāda ca dhātrīm -- ' mātaḥ ebhis tuṣair arthino bhūṣaṇamṛjākriyākṣamaiḥ svarṇakārāḥ |
GK19danddk1u:646: tebhya imān datvā labdhābhiḥ kākiṇībhiḥ sthiratarāṇy anatyārdrāṇi na atiśuṣkāṇi kāṣṭhāni mitaṃpacāṃ sthālīm ubhe śarāve cāhara ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:647_0: tathākṛte tayā tāms taṇḍulān anatinimnottānavistīrṇakukṣau kakubholūkhale lohapatraveṣṭitamukhena
GK19danddk1u:647_1: samaśarīreṇa vibhāvyamānamadhyatānavena vyāyatena guruṇā khādireṇa musalena caturalalitotkṣepaṇāvakṣepaṇāyāsitabhujam
GK19danddk1u:647_2: asakṛdaṅgulībhir uddhṛtyoddhṛtya avahatya śūrpaśodhitakaṇakiṃ śārukāms taṇḍulān asakṛd
GK19danddk1u:647_3: adbhiḥ prakṣālya kvathitapañcaguṇe jale dattacullīpūjā prākṣipat |
GK19danddk1u:648: praślathāvayaveṣu prasphuratsu taṇḍuleṣu mukulāvasthām ativartamāneṣu saṅkṣipya analam upahitamukhapidhānayā sthālyā annamaṇḍam agālayat |
GK19danddk1u:649: darvyā ca avaghaṭṭya mātrayā parivartya samapakveṣu siktheṣu tāṃ sthālīm adhomukhīm avātiṣṭhipat
GK19danddk1u:650: indhanāny antaḥsārāṇy ambhasā samabhyukṣya praśamitāgnīni kṛṣṇāṅgārīkṛtya tadarthibhyaḥ prāhiṇot -- ' ebhir labdhāḥ kākiṇīr datvā śākaṃ ghṛtaṃ dadhi tailam āmalakaṃ
GK19danddk1u:652: tathā anuṣṭhite ca tayā dvitrān upadamśān upapādya tadannamaṇḍam ārdravālukopahitanavaśarāvagatam atimṛdunā tālavṛntānilena śītalīkṛtya salavaṇasambhāraṃ
GK19danddk1u:653: dattāṅgāradhūpavāsaṃ ca sampādya tad apy āmalakaṃ ślakṣṇapiṣṭam utpalagandhi kṛtvā dhātrīmukhena snā nāya tam acodayat |
GK19danddk1u:654: tayā ca snānaśuddhayā dattatailāmalakaḥ krameṇa sasnau |
GK19danddk1u:655: snātaḥ siktamṛṣṭe kuṭṭime phalakam āruhya pāṇḍuharitasya tribhāgaśeṣalūnasya aṅgaṇakadalīpalāśasyopari śarāvadvayaṃ dattam
GK19danddk1u:657: sā tu tāṃ peyām eva agre samupāharat |
GK19danddk1u:658: pītvā ca apanatādhvaklamaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ praklinnasakalagātraḥ sthito 'bhūt |
GK19danddk1u:659: tatas tasya śālyodanasya darvīdvayaṃ datvā sarpirmā trāṃ sūpam upadamśaṃ copajahāra |
GK19danddk1u:660: imaṃ ca dadhnā ca trijātakāvacūrṇitena surabhiśītalābhyāṃ ca kālaśeyakāñjikābhyāṃ śeṣam annam abhojayat |
GK19danddk1u:663: atha navabhṛṅgārasambhṛtam agurudhūpadhūpitam abhinavapāṭalīkusumavāsitam utphullotpalagrathitasaurabhaṃ vāri nālīdhārātmanā pātayāṃ babhūva |
GK19danddk1u:666: śiraḥkampasaṃjñāvāritā ca punar aparakarakeṇācamanam adatta kanyā |
GK19danddk1u:667: vṛddhayā tu taducchiṣṭam apohya haritagomayopalipte kuṭṭime svam evottarīyakarpaṭaṃ vyavadhāya kṣaṇam aśeta |
GK19danddk1u:668: parituṣṭaś ca vidhivad upayamya kanyāṃ ninye |
GK19danddk1u:671: patiṃ ca daivatam iva muktatandrā paryacarat |
GK19danddk1u:674: tadguṇavaśīkṛtaś ca bhartā sarvam eva kuṭumbaṃ tadāyattam eva kṛtvā tadekādhīnajīvitaśarīras trivargaṃ nirviveśa |
GK19danddk1u:675: tad bravīmi --' gṛhiṇaḥ priyahitāya dāraguṇāḥ ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:679: tasyāṃ gṛhaguptanāmno guhyakendratulyavibhavasya nāvikapater duhitā ratnavatī nāma |
GK19danddk1u:680: tāṃ kila madhumatyāḥ samupāgamya balabhadro nāma sārthavāhaputraḥ paryaṇaiṣīt |
GK19danddk1u:681: tayā api navavadhvā rahasi rabhasavighnitasuratasukho jhaṭiti dveṣam alpetaraṃ babandha |
GK19danddk1u:684: tāṃ ca durbhagāṃ tadāprabhṛty eva ' neyaṃ ratnavatī nimbavatī ceyam iti svajanaḥ parajanaś ca paribabhūva |
GK19danddk1u:685: gate ca kasmimś=cit kāle sā tv anutapyamānā ' kā me gatiḥ iti vimṛśantī kām api vṛddhapravrājikāṃ
GK19danddk1u:688: tayā apy udaśrumukhyā bahuprakāram anunīya ruditakāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭā trapamāṇā api kāryagauravāt kathañ=cid abravīt -- ' amba kiṃ bravīmi |
GK19danddk1u:689: daurbhāgyaṃ nāma jīvanmaraṇam eva aṅganānām viśeṣataś ca kulavadhūnām |
GK19danddk1u:694: na cet tyajeyam adyaiva niṣprayojanān prāṇān |
GK19danddk1u:695: ā virāmāc ca me rahasyaṃ nāśrāvyam ' iti pādayoḥ papāta |
GK19danddk1u:696: sainām utthāpyodbāṣpovāca -- ' vatse mā adhyavasyaḥ sāhasam |
GK19danddk1u:698: yāvati mamopayogas tava tāvati bhavāmy ananyādhīnā |
GK19danddk1u:699: yady eva asi nirviṇṇā tapaś cara tvaṃ madadhiṣṭhitā pāralaukikāya kalyāṇāya |
GK19danddk1u:700: nanv ayam udarkaḥ prāktanasya duṣkṛtasya yadanenākāreṇedṛśena śīlena jātyā caivaṃbhūtayā samanugatā saty akasmād eva bhartṛdveṣyatāṃ gatā asi |
GK19danddk1u:704: atha asau kathañ=cit kṣaṇam adhomukhī dhyātvā
GK19danddk1u:705: dīrghoṣṇaśvāsapūrvam avocat -- ' bhagavati patir eva daivataṃ vanitānām viśeṣataś ca kulajānām
GK19danddk1u:709: abhijanena vibhavena rājāntaraṅgabhāvena ca sarvapaurān atītya vartate |
GK19danddk1u:710: tasya kanyā kanakavatī nāma matsamānarūpāvayavā mama atisnigdhā sakhī |
GK19danddk1u:713: tvayā tu tanmātṛprārthanaṃ sakaruṇam abhidhāya matpatir etadgṛhaṃ kathañ=canāneyaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:714: samīpagateṣu ca yuṣmāsu krīḍāmattā nāma kandukaṃ bhramśayeyam |
GK19danddk1u:715: atha tam ādāya tasya haste datvā vakṣyasi -- ' putra taveyaṃ bhāryāsakhī nidhipatidattasya sarvaśreṣṭhimukhyasya kanyā kanakavatī nāma |
GK19danddk1u:716: tvām iyam anavastho niṣkaruṇaś ceti ratnavatīnimittam atyarthaṃ nindati |
GK19danddk1u:717: tad eṣa kanduko vipakṣadhanaṃ pratyarpaṇīyam ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:719: sa tathokto niyatam unmukhībhūya tām eva priyasakhīṃ manyamāno mām baddhāñjali yācamānāyai mahyaṃ bhūyas tvatprārthitaḥ sābhilāṣam arpayiṣyati |
GK19danddk1u:720: tena randhreṇopaśliṣya rāgam ujjvalīkṛtya yathā asau kṛtasaṅketo deśāntaram ādāya māṃ gamiṣyati tathopapādanīyam ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:722: athaitām kanakavatīti vṛddhatāpasīpralabdho balabhadraḥ saratnasārābharaṇām ādāya niśi nīrandhre tamasi prāvasat |
GK19danddk1u:723: sā tu tāpasī vārtām āpādayat -- ' mandena mayā nirnimittam upekṣitā ratnavatī śvaśurau ca paribhūtau
GK19danddk1u:725: tad atraiva samsṛṣṭo jīvituṃ jihremīti balabhadraḥ pūrvedyur mām akathayat |
GK19danddk1u:726: nūnam asau tena nītā vyaktiś ca acirād bhaviṣyati iti |
GK19danddk1u:727: tac chrutvā tadbāndhavās tadanveṣaṇaṃ prati śithilayatnās tasthuḥ |
GK19danddk1u:728: ratnavatī tu mārge kāñ=cit paṇyadāsīṃ saṅgṛhya tayohyamānapātheyādyupaskarā kheṭakapuram agamat |
GK19danddk1u:729: amutra ca vyavahārakuśalo balabhadraḥ svalpenaiva mūlena mahaddhanam upārjayat |
GK19danddk1u:732: tatas tāṃ prathamadāsīṃ ' na karma karoṣi
GK19danddk1u:733: dṛṣṭaṃ muṣṇāsi apriyaṃ bravīṣi ' iti paruṣam uktvā bahv atāḍayat |
GK19danddk1u:734: ceṭī tu prasādakālopakhyātarahasyasya vṛttāntaikadeśam āttaroṣā nirbibheda |
GK19danddk1u:735: tac chrutvā tu lubdhena daṇḍavāhinā pauravṛddhasamnidhau ' nidhipatidattasya kanyāṃ kanakavatīṃ moṣeṇa apahṛtya asmatpure nivasaty eṣa durmatir balabhadraḥ |
GK19danddk1u:736: tasya sarvasvaharaṇaṃ bhavadbhir na pratibandhanīyam ' iti nitarām abhartsayata |
GK19danddk1u:737: bhītaṃ ca balabhadram adhijagāda ratnavatī -- ' na bhetavyam |
GK19danddk1u:739: valabhyām eva gṛhaguptaduhitā ratnavatī nāmeyaṃ dattā pitṛbhyāṃ mayā ca nyāyoḍhā |
GK19danddk1u:740: na cet pratītha praṇidhiṃ prahiṇuta asyā bandhupārśvam ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:741: balabhadras tu tathoktvā śreṇīprātibhāvyena tāvad eva atiṣṭhad yāvat tatpuralekhyalabdhavṛttānto gṛhaguptaḥ kheṭakapuram āgatya saha jāmātrā duhitaram atiprītaḥ pratyanaiṣīt |
GK19danddk1u:742: tathā dṛṣṭvā ratnavatī kanakavatīti bhāvayatas tasyaiva bhalabhadrasya ativallabhā jātā |
GK19danddk1u:743: tad bravīmi -- ' kāmo nāma saṅkalpaḥ ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:745: so 'ham abravam -- ' asti śūraseneṣu mathurā nāma nagarī |
GK19danddk1u:746: tatra kaś=cit kulaputraḥ kalāsu gaṇikāsu ca atiraktaḥ mitrārthaṃ
GK19danddk1u:747: svabhujamātranirvyūḍhānekakalahaḥ kalahakaṇṭaka iti karkaśair abhikhyāpitākhyaḥ pratyavātsīt
GK19danddk1u:748: sa caikadā kasya=cid āgantoś citrakarasya haste
GK19danddk1u:752: sa ca tam abravīt -- ' bhadra viruddham ivaitat
GK19danddk1u:754: yataḥ kulajādurlabhaṃ vapuḥ ābhijātyaśamsinī ca namratā pāṇḍurā ca mukhacchaviḥ anatiparibhuktasubhagā ca tanuḥ prauḍhatānuviddhā ca dṛṣṭiḥ |
GK19danddk1u:757: tad iyaṃ vṛddhasya kasya=cid vaṇijo na atipumstvasya yathārhasambhogālābhapīḍitā gṛhiṇī tvayā atikauśalād yathādṛṣṭam ālikhitā bhavitum arhati ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:758: sa tam abhipraśasya aśamsat -- ' satyam idam |
GK19danddk1u:759: avantipuryām ujjayinyām anantakīrtināmnaḥ sārthavāhasya bhāryā yathārthanāmā nitambavatī nāmaiṣā saundaryavismitena mayaivam ālikhitā ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:761: bhārgavo nāma bhūtvā bhikṣānibhena tadgṛhaṃ praviśya tāṃ dadarśa |
GK19danddk1u:762: dṛṣṭvā ca atyārūḍhamanmatho nirgatya pauramukhyebhyaḥ śmaśānarakṣām ayācata |
GK19danddk1u:764: tatra labdhaiś ca śavāvaguṇṭhanapaṭādibhiḥ kām apy arhantikāṃ nāma śramaṇikām upāsāñ cakre
GK19danddk1u:765: tanmukhena ca nimbavatīm upāmśu mantrayām āsa |
GK19danddk1u:767: śramaṇikāmukhāc ca duṣkaraśīlabhramśāṃ kulastriyam upalabhya rahasi dūtikām aśikṣayat -- '
GK19danddk1u:769: brūhi copahvare samsāradoṣadarśanāt samādhim āsthāya mumukṣamāṇo mādṛśo janaḥ kulavadhūnāṃ śīlapātane ghaṭatae iti kva ghaṭate |
GK19danddk1u:770: etad api tvam atyudārayā samṛddhyā rūpeṇa atimānuṣeṇa prathamena vayasopapannāṃ kim itaranārīsulabhaṃ cāpalaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ na veti parīkṣā kṛtā |
GK19danddk1u:773: bhartā tu bhavatyāḥ kena=cid graheṇa adhiṣṭhitaḥ pāṇḍurogadurbalo bhoge ca asamarthaḥ sthito abhūt |
GK19danddk1u:774: na ca śakyaṃ tasya vighnam apratikṛtya apatyam asmāl labdhum |
GK19danddk1u:777: kasya=cin mantravādinaś channam eva haste caraṇam arpayitvā tadabhimantritena praṇayakupitā nāma bhūtvā bhartāram urasi prahartum arhasi |
GK19danddk1u:782: naktaṃ māṃ vṛkṣavāṭikāṃ praveśya tām api praveśayiṣyasi |
GK19danddk1u:783: tāvataiva tvayā aham anugṛhīto bhave yam ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:786: vṛkṣavāṭikāṃ gato nitambavatīṃ nirgranthikāprayatnenopanītāṃ pāde parāmṛśann iva hemanūpuram ekam ākṣipya cchurikayorumūle kiñ=cid ālikhya drutataram apāsarat |
GK19danddk1u:787_0: sā tu sāndratrāsā svam eva durnayaṃ garhamāṇā jighāmsantīva śramaṇikāṃ tadvraṇaṃ
GK19danddk1u:787_1: bhavanadīrghikāyāṃ prakṣālya datvā paṭabandhanaṃ sāmayāpadeśād aparaṃ ca apanīya
GK19danddk1u:787_2: nūpuraṃ śayanaparā tricaturāṇi dināny ekānte ninye |
GK19danddk1u:788: sa dhūrtaḥ ' vikreṣye ' iti tena nūpureṇa tam anantakīrtim upāsasāda |
GK19danddk1u:789: sa dṛṣṭvā mama gṛhiṇyā evaiṣa nūpuraḥ katham ayam upalabdhas tvayā ' iti tam abruvāṇaṃ nirbandhena papraccha |
GK19danddk1u:790: sa tu ' vaṇiggrāmasya agre vakṣyāmi ' iti sthito abhūt |
GK19danddk1u:793: sā ca salajjaṃ sasādhvasaṃ ca ' adya rātrau viśrāmapraviṣṭāyāṃ vṛkṣavāṭikāyāṃ prabhraṣṭo mamaikaḥ praśithilabandho nūpuraḥ |
GK19danddk1u:795: sa punar ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ ' ity aparaṃ prā hiṇot |
GK19danddk1u:796: anayā ca vārtayā amuṃ puraskṛtya sa vaṇig vaṇigjanasamājam ājagāma |
GK19danddk1u:797: sa ca anuyukto dhūrtaḥ savinayam āvedayat -- '
GK19danddk1u:798: viditam eva khalu vo yathā ahaṃ yuṣmadājñayā pitṛvanam abhi rakṣya tadupajīvī prativasāmi
GK19danddk1u:799: lubdhāś ca kadā=cin maddarśanabhīravo niśi daheyur api śavānīti niśāsv api śmaśānam
GK19danddk1u:801: aparedyur dagdhādagdhaṃ mṛtakaṃ citāyāḥ prasabham ākarṣantīṃ śyāmākārāṃ nārīm apaśyam |
GK19danddk1u:802: arthalobhāt tu nigṛhya bhayaṃ sā saṅgṛhītā |
GK19danddk1u:808: vimarśe ca tasyāḥ śākinī tvam aikamatyena paurāṇām abhimatam āsīt |
GK19danddk1u:809: bhartrā ca parityaktā tasminn eva śmaśāne bahu vilapya pāśenodbadhya martukāmā tena dhūrtena naktam agṛhyata |
GK19danddk1u:811: tvadāvarjane bahūn upāyān bhikṣukīmukhenopanyasya teṣv asiddheṣu punar ayam upāyo yāvajjīvam asādhāraṇīkṛtya rantum ācaritaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:812: tat prasīda ananyaśaraṇāya asmai dāsajanāya ' iti muhur muhuś caraṇayor nipatya prayujya sāntvaśatāni tām agatyantarām
GK19danddk1u:814: tad idam uktam -- ' duṣkarasādhanaṃ prajñā ' iti |
GK19danddk1u:815: sa cedam ākarṇya brahmarākṣaso mām apūpujat |
GK19danddk1u:816: asminn eva kṣaṇe na atiprauḍhapumnāgamukulasthūlāni muktāphalāni saha salilabindubhir ambaratalād apatan |
GK19danddk1u:817: ahaṃ tu ' kiṃ nv idam ' ity uccakṣur ālokayan
GK19danddk1u:818: kam=api rākṣasaṃ kāñ=cid aṅganāṃ viceṣṭamānagātrām ākarṣantam apaśyam |
GK19danddk1u:819: katham apaharaty akāmām api striyam anācāro nairṛta iti gaganagamanamandaśaktir aśastraś ca atapye |
GK19danddk1u:820: sa tu matsambandhī brahmarākṣasaḥ ' tiṣṭha tiṣṭha pāpa kva apaharasi ' iti bhartsayann
GK19danddk1u:822: tāṃ tu roṣād anapekṣāpaviddhām amaravṛkṣamañjarīm iva antarikṣād āpatantīm unmukhaprasāritobhayakaraḥ karābhyām agrahīṣam |
GK19danddk1u:823: upagṛhya ca vepamānāṃ sammīlitākṣīṃ madaṅgasparśasukhenodbhinnaromāñcāṃ tādṛśīm eva tām anavatārayann atiṣṭham |
GK19danddk1u:824: tāvat tāv ubhāv api śailaśṛṅgabhaṅgaiḥ pādapaiś ca rabhasonmūlitair muṣṭipādaprahāraiś ca parasparam akṣapayetām |
GK19danddk1u:825: punar aham atimṛduni pulinavati kusumalavalāñchite sarastīre 'varopya saspṛhaṃ nirvarṇayams
GK19danddk1u:827: sā hi mayā samāśvāsyamānā tiryaṅ mām abhinirūpya jātapratyabhijñā sakaruṇam arodīt |
GK19danddk1u:829: tasmin kandukotsave punaḥ sakhyā candrasenayā tvatkathābhir eva samāśvāsitā asmi |
GK19danddk1u:830: tvaṃ kila samudramadhye majjitaḥ pāpena madbhrātrā bhīmadhanvanā iti śrutvā sakhījanaṃ parijanaṃ ca vañcayitvā jīvitaṃ jihāsur ekākinī krīḍāvanam upāgamam |
GK19danddk1u:831: tatra ca mām acakamata kāmarūpa eṣa rākṣasādhamaḥ |
GK19danddk1u:835: ahaṃ ca daivāt tavaiva jīvita īśasya haste patitā |
GK19danddk1u:837: śrutvā ca tayā saha avaruhya nāvam adhyāroham |
GK19danddk1u:838: muktā ca nauḥ prativātapreritā tām eva dāmaliptāṃ pratyupā tiṣṭhat |
GK19danddk1u:840: ' tanayasya ca tanayāyāś ca nāśād ananyāpatyas
GK19danddk1u:841: tuṅgadhanvā suhmapatir niṣkalaḥ svayaṃ sakalatra eva niṣkalaṅkagaṅgārodhasy anaśanenoparantuṃ pratiṣṭhate |
GK19danddk1u:846: atha aham asmai rājñe yathāvṛttam ākhyāya tadapatyadvayaṃ pratyarpitavān |
GK19danddk1u:849: madājñaptena ca amunā prāṇavad ujjhitā candrasenā kośadāsam abhajat |
GK19danddk1u:850: tataś ca simhavarmasāhāyyārtham atrāgatya bhartus tava darśanotsavasukham anubhavāmi ' iti
GK19danddk1u:853: ' ity abhidhāya bhūyaḥ smitābhiṣiktadantacchado mantragupte harṣotphullaṃ cakṣuḥ pātayāmāsa
GK19danddk1u:857: / iti śrī daṇḍinaḥ kṛtau daśakumāracarite mitraguptacaritaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭha ucchvāsaḥ /
